long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A handy, simple tool that displays a list of URLs from your open tabs in a sidebar. It's useful for sharing multiple tabs or saving them for later. Simply copy the list from the sidebar and paste it into an email or document.

The extension automatically selects which tabs to display: it shows selected tabs (if any), tabs in the current group (if applicable), or the rightmost tabs up to the current tab. The list updates automatically.
